attacks.name: Miracle Tail
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose a Special Condition (Asleep, Burned, Confused, Paralyzed, or Poisoned). The Defending Pokémon is now affected by that Special Condition.

attacks.name: Roasting Heat
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is Burned, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.
